sentence.Network_en: Extending beyond the apex of a leaf , as a midrib or vein.
sentence.Network_cn: 在接近中脉处有一个或多个切刻.

sentence.Network_en: Of or relating to a midrib that extends throughout the entire length of a leaf.
sentence.Network_cn: 在叶的中脉附近裂开,彼此之间距离很近,没有完全分开成单个个体.

sentence.Network_en: Some martensite like bainites such as crossed type and midrib type in the alloy were investigated.
sentence.Network_cn: 观察到交叉型、中脊型类马氏体形貌贝氏体,发现贝氏体中脊中有大量层错.
